title: You know it’s a bad sign when…
author: VD
content_html:
…your name has entered the vernacular as a synonym for incompetent inaction. From ESPN:

Replays showed the ball did not break the plane. Although the play could not have been ruled a fumble since the whistle had blown, Belichick still could have contested the touchdown call. Yet he went Mike Tice and just stood there. No challenge. Earth to Bill …

Sweet Shub-Niggurath, but this could be a LONG season. If anyone has recorded any WNBA games, please burn it to DVD and forward them to the Original Cyberpunk. He is in dire need of some palate cleansing.
